languages.text: Офицер отдает честь и спешит к вокс-системе мостика, к Мастеру вокса, склонившейся над станцией. Несколько мгновений спустя слышится удивленный вскрик: "Лорд-капитан, наши сообщения искажаются на глазах! "Разгерметизировать нижние отсеки", "Казнить адептов Машинного культа", "Отключить системы жизнеобеспечения"... Если хоть одна команда пробьется наружу..."

traits.locale_text: Офицер Кельбо отдает честь и спешит к вокс-системе мостика. Несколько мгновений спустя слышится удивленый вскрик Мастера Вокса. "Лорд-капитан, наши сообщения искажаются на глазах! "Разгерметизировать нижние отсеки", "Казнить адептов машинного культа", "Отключить системы жизнеобеспечения"... Если хоть одна команда пробьется наружу..." — Вигдис громко сглатывает.

languages.text: The officer salutes and hurries over to the bridge vox-system, to the Vox Master, who is leaning over her station. Moments later, a cry of surprise: "Lord Captain, our transmissions are being distorted as we speak! 'Depressurise the lower bays,' 'Execute adepts of the Machine Cult,' 'Disable the life support systems'... If even one command gets out..."
languages.original_text: Офицер отдает честь и спешит к вокс-системе мостика, к Мастеру вокса, склонившейся над станцией. Несколько мгновений спустя слышится удивленный вскрик: "Лорд-капитан, наши сообщения искажаются на глазах! "Разгерметизировать нижние отсеки", "Казнить адептов Машинного культа", "Отключить системы жизнеобеспечения"... Если хоть одна команда пробьется наружу..."

traits.locale_text: The officer salutes and hurries over to the bridge vox-system, to the Vox Master, who is leaning over her station. Moments later, a cry of surprise, "Lord Captain, our transmissions are being distorted as we speak! 'Depressurize the lower modules,' 'Execute adepts of the Machine Cult,' 'Disable the life support systems'... If at least one command gets out..."

The officer salutes and hurries over to the bridge vox-system, to the Vox Master, who is leaning over her station. Moments later, a cry of surprise, "Lord Captain, our transmissions are being distorted as we speak! 'Depressurize the lower modules,' 'Execute adepts of the Machine Cult,' 'Disable the life support systems'... If at least one command gets out..."

Moments later, a cry of surprise: "Lord Captain, our transmissions are being distorted as we speak! 'Depressurise the lower modules,' 'Execute adepts of the Machine Cult,' 'Disable the life support systems'... If even one command gets out..."

The officer salutes and hurries over to the bridge vox-system, to the Vox Master, who is leaning over her station. Moments later, a cry of surprise: "Lord Captain, our transmissions are being distorted as we speak! 'Depressurise the lower modules,' 'Execute adepts of the Machine Cult,' 'Disable the life support systems'... If even one command gets out..."

The officer salutes and hurries over to the bridge vox-system, to the Vox Master, who is leaning over her station. Moments later, a cry of surprise: "Lord Captain, our transmissions are being distorted as we speak! 'Depressurise the lower bays,' 'Execute adepts of the Machine Cult,' 'Disable the life support systems'... If even one command gets out..."

languages.text: El oficial saluda y corre hacia el sistema de vocos del puente, donde la maestra de vocos atiende a sus funciones. Al poco, se produce un grito de sorpresa. «¡Lord Capitán, algo está interfiriendo en nuestras transmisiones mientras hablamos! "Despresuricen los módulos inferiores", "Ejecuten a los adeptos del Culto Máquina", "Desactiven los sistemas de soporte vital"... Como una sola de esas órdenes llegue a darse...».
languages.original_text: The officer salutes and hurries over to the bridge vox-system, to the Vox Master, who is leaning over her station. Moments later, a cry of surprise: "Lord Captain, our transmissions are being distorted as we speak! 'Depressurise the lower bays,' 'Execute adepts of the Machine Cult,' 'Disable the life support systems'... If even one command gets out..."

traits.locale_text: El oficial saluda y corre hacia el sistema de vocos del puente, donde la maestra de vocos atiende a sus funciones. Al poco, se produce un grito de sorpresa. «¡L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, algo está interfiriendo en nuestras transmisiones mientras hablamos! "Despresurizad los módulos inferiores", "Ejecutad a los adeptos del Culto Máquina", "Desactivad los sistemas de soporte vital"... Como una sola de esas órdenes llegue a darse...».

languages.text: 这名军官敬了个礼，之后匆匆走向舰桥的音阵系统，朝正在伏案工作的音阵大师走去。几分钟后，他发出一声惊呼：“舰长大人，就在我们说话的这段时间里，我们下达的命令遭到了篡改！‘降低下层区域的舱压’、‘处决那些机械修会的神甫’、‘关闭生命维持系统’……万一这些遭到篡改的命令被传达出去，后果……”
languages.original_text: The officer salutes and hurries over to the bridge vox-system, to the Vox Master, who is leaning over her station. Moments later, a cry of surprise: "Lord Captain, our transmissions are being distorted as we speak! 'Depressurise the lower bays,' 'Execute adepts of the Machine Cult,' 'Disable the life support systems'... If even one command gets out..."

traits.locale_text: 这名军官敬了个礼，之后匆匆走向舰桥的音阵系统，朝正在伏案工作的音阵大师走去。几分钟后，他发出一声惊呼：“舰长大人，就在我们说话的这段时间里，我们下达的命令遭到了篡改！‘降低下层区域的舱压’、‘处决那些机械修会的祭司’、‘关闭生命维持系统’……万一这些遭到篡改的命令被传达出去，后果……”

languages.text: 士官は敬礼して、ブリッジのヴォクスシステム、ステーションを屈んで見るヴォクス・マスターのところへ急いだ。しばらくして、驚いた叫び声が聞こえる。「ロード・キャプテン、話している間に通信が歪みました！『下部ベイを減圧せよ』『機械教団の実力者を処刑せよ』『生命維持装置を無効化せよ』…命令がひとつでも実現できなかったら…」
languages.original_text: The officer salutes and hurries over to the bridge vox-system, to the Vox Master, who is leaning over her station. Moments later, a cry of surprise: "Lord Captain, our transmissions are being distorted as we speak! 'Depressurise the lower bays,' 'Execute adepts of the Machine Cult,' 'Disable the life support systems'... If even one command gets out..."

traits.locale_text: 士官は敬礼して、ブリッジのヴォクスシステム、ステーションを屈んで見るヴォクス・マスターのところへ急いだ。しばらくして、驚いた叫び声が聞こえる。「ロード・キャプテン、話している間に通信が歪みました！『下部ベイを減圧せよ』『機械教団の実力者を処刑せよ』『生命維持装置を無効化せよ』…命令がひとつでも実現できなかったら…」

languages.text: Der Offizier salutiert und eilt zum Voxsystem der Brücke, wo die Voxmeisterin sich gerade über ihre Station beugt. Sekunden später ein Ausruf der Überraschung: "Lord Captain, unsere Übertragungen werden exakt in diesem Augenblick gestört! 'Untere Buchten dekomprimieren', 'Adepten des Maschinenkults hinrichten', 'Lebenserhaltungssysteme deaktivieren' ... Wenn auch nur einer dieser Befehle ankommt ..."
languages.original_text: The officer salutes and hurries over to the bridge vox-system, to the Vox Master, who is leaning over her station. Moments later, a cry of surprise: "Lord Captain, our transmissions are being distorted as we speak! 'Depressurise the lower bays,' 'Execute adepts of the Machine Cult,' 'Disable the life support systems'... If even one command gets out..."

languages.text: L'officier fait un salut et se dirige d'un pas rapide vers le système-vox du pont pour parler à la maîtresse-vox penchée sur son poste. Un instant plus tard, un cri de surprise retentit : « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, quelque chose altère nos transmissions ! "Dépressurisez les baies inférieures." "Exécutez les fidèles du culte de la machine." "Coupez les systèmes de survie." Si le moindre de ces ordres parvenait au reste du vaisseau... »
languages.original_text: The officer salutes and hurries over to the bridge vox-system, to the Vox Master, who is leaning over her station. Moments later, a cry of surprise: "Lord Captain, our transmissions are being distorted as we speak! 'Depressurise the lower bays,' 'Execute adepts of the Machine Cult,' 'Disable the life support systems'... If even one command gets out..."

traits.locale_text: L'officier fait un salut et se dirige d'un pas rapide vers le système-vox du pont pour parler à la maîtresse-vox penchée sur son poste. Un instant plus tard, un cri de surprise retentit : « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, quelque chose altère nos transmissions ! "Dépressurisez les modules inférieurs." "Exécutez les fidèles du culte de la machine." "Coupez les systèmes de survie." Si le moindre de ces ordres parvenait au reste du vaisseau... »

languages.text: Subay selam verip alelacele köprünün voks sistemine, istasyonuna doğru eğilen Voks Üstadı'na koşuyor. Dakikalar sonra bir şaşkınlık çığlığı atılıyor. "Lord Kaptan, yayınlarımız çarpıtılıyor! 'Alt bölmelerin basıncını düşürün', 'Makine Tarikatı ustalarını idam edin', 'Yaşam destek sistemlerini devre dışı bırakın'... Bunların biri bile duyulursa..."
languages.original_text: The officer salutes and hurries over to the bridge vox-system, to the Vox Master, who is leaning over her station. Moments later, a cry of surprise: "Lord Captain, our transmissions are being distorted as we speak! 'Depressurise the lower bays,' 'Execute adepts of the Machine Cult,' 'Disable the life support systems'... If even one command gets out..."

traits.locale_text: Subay selam verip alelacele köprünün voks sistemine, istasyonuna doğru eğilen Voks Üstadı'na koşuyor. Dakikalar sonra bir şaşkınlık çığlığı atılıyor. "Lord Kaptan, yayınlarımız çarpıtılıyor! 'Alt bölmelerin basıncını düşürün', 'Makine Tarikatı ustalarını idam edin', 'Yaşam destek sistemlerini devre dışı bırakın'... Bunların biri bile duyulursa..."
